## Our Mission

The mission of the International Society for Kaigo Research is to promote the highest levels of achievement in kaigo research and training worldwide, and to interact with other international, inter-governmental and non-governmental organizations in the promotion of kaigo interests globally and on behalf of its member associations. The Society pursues these activities with a view of enhancing the highest quality of life and well being of all people as they experience ageing at individual and societal levels.

## International Rules

ISKR By-Laws comply with the regulations of the Japanese Government.
